===Etymology===
An alliterative augmentation of {{och-l|蝠|bat}}, from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*baːk||bat}}. Cognate with {{cog|lus|bâk||bat}}.

|md=biēng-hók
|mn=pián-hok/pian-hok
|w=1pi foq
|mc=y

|cat=n
}}
